```{r setup, include=FALSE,warning=F,message=F}
library(geodist)
gpsdat <- read.csv('data/gps-data.csv')
str(gpsdat)
gpsdat$Latitude <- as.numeric(gpsdat$Latitude)
gpsdat$Longitude <- as.numeric(gpsdat$Longitude)
```

## Calculate distance matrix for distance between sampling locations
Distance is in meters - see geodist vignettes.
```{r }
library(tidyverse)
site_coords <- gpsdat %>% select(Longitude,Latitude)
rownames(site_coords) <- c(gpsdat$Local.Label)
distmat <- geodist(site_coords)
max(distmat,na.rm=T) # max distance ~241m

```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
